Utils

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Vector

  • public final class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Vector2 is a common implementation of 2D Vectors.
     

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double norm
      The current vector's norm
